SELECT ROWNUM INTNUM, RN, BM.BM_SEQ INTSEQ, BM.BM_PSEQ INTPSEQ, BM.BM_GET_USER STRWRITERCODE, UM.UM_NAME STRNAME, BM.BM_GET_DATE DATGET_DATE, BM.BM_EDIT_DATE DATEDIT_DATE, NVL(CNT.BV_CNT, 0) INTHIT, BM.BM_DETAIL_COMMENT STRDETAILCOMMENT, DAT.CNT INTCOMMENTCOUNT,
CASE
WHEN BM.BM_TITLE IS NULL AND DAT.CNT > 0 THEN BMP.BM_TITLE || ' ' || '[' || DAT.CNT ||']' WHEN BM.BM_TITLE IS NOT NULL AND DAT.CNT > 0 THEN BM.BM_TITLE || ' ' || '[' || DAT.CNT || ']' WHEN BM.BM_TITLE IS NULL AND DAT.CNT = 0 THEN BMP.BM_TITLE WHEN BM.BM_TITLE IS NOT NULL AND DAT.CNT = 0 THEN BM.BM_TITLE ELSE BM.BM_TITLE END STRTITLE
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD_MAIN ORDER BY BM_SEQ DESC ) R
START WITH BM_PSEQ = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR BM_SEQ = BM_PSEQ ) BM
LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_MAIN UM ON (BM.BM_GET_USER = UM.UM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_VIEW BV ON (BM.BM_SEQ = BV.BV_BM_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_MAIN BMP ON (BM.BM_PSEQ = BMP.BM_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BV_BM_SEQ, COUNT(*) BV_CNT FROM BOARD_VIEW GROUP BY BV_BM_SEQ ) CNT ON (BM.BM_SEQ = CNT.BV_BM_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BM_PSEQ PSEQ, COUNT(BM_SEQ) CNT FROM BOARD_MAIN WHERE BM_PSEQ > 0 AND BM_GROUP = '003' GROUP BY BM_PSEQ ) DAT ON (BM.BM_SEQ = DAT.PSEQ)
WHERE BM.BM_GROUP_BCODE = '400' AND BM.BM_GROUP = '001' AND BM.BM_KIND_BCODE = '401' AND BM.BM_KIND = '002'

SELECT BM.BM_SEQ INTSEQ, BM.BM_GET_USER STRCOMMENTERCODE, UM.UM_NAME STRNAME, UM.UM_ID STRID, BM.BM_GET_DATE DATCOMMENT_DATE, BM.BM_DETAIL_COMMENT STRCOMMENT
FROM BOARD_MAIN BM LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_MAIN UM ON (BM.BM_GET_USER = UM.UM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_MAIN BMP ON (BM.BM_PSEQ = BMP.BM_SEQ)
WHERE BM.BM_GROUP_BCODE = '400' AND BM.BM_GROUP = '003' AND BM.BM_KIND_BCODE = '401' AND BM.BM_KIND = '002' AND BM_SEQ = #{intSeq}
ORDER BY DATCOMMENT_DATE
